channel.title: Weird error
channel.description:
This is the error: "client.java:12507: illegal start of expression ------public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { -----.^ 1 error Press any key to continue"
the "-" arn't there, I have to do that or it will just go back.
Why is it saing this?

item.title: Weird error

item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

You added a method that exceeds the amount of closing braces above public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) making the bank code part of the above code.

Fix:

} } } public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {

@Amerks5 wrote:

This error is caused from removing/editting a command

if (command.startsWith("jad")) { teleportToX = myxcoords; teleportToY = myycoords; sendMessage("you teleport to jaddy"); }

originally the last “}” was “{” so that was the problem, another error is I have on the cash command messageToAll("LOL someone sued the cash command!");
but I get an error…
